pullRequest.title: [alarmdecoder] Add vzone thing for virtual zone control
pullRequest.bodyText: This PR adds support for a new vzone thing for control of AD virtual zones. This allows users to open and close the virtual zones from openHAB.

commit.message:
[alarmdecoder] Add vzone thing for virtual zone control

Signed-off-by: Bob Adair <bob.github@att.net>

[alarmdecoder] Add state channel to vzone thing

Signed-off-by: Bob Adair <bob.github@att.net>

nodes.bodyText:
This would be more maintainable if all of the zone handlers shared the same parent class or implemented the same interface.
It also might just be simpler to just call notifyPanelReady() on all handlers since only the zone handlers have a non-empty implementations anyway.

commit.message:
[alarmdecoder] Address review comments

Signed-off-by: Bob Adair <bob.github@att.net>
